name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: The locally assigned unique identification by the software. For example: handle ID.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The locally assigned unique identification by the software. For example: handle ID.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The component type as defined in the object-oriented or metric nomenclature partition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The component type as defined in the object-oriented or metric nomenclature partition.

name: $lastSystemChange
desc: Returns: The timestamp for the most recent system change which includes device configuration or setting change.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The timestamp for the most recent system change which includes device configuration or setting change.

name: $source
desc: Returns: The link to the source Device that contains administrative device information such as manufacture, serial number, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The link to the source Device that contains administrative device information such as manufacture, serial number, etc.

name: $parent
desc: Returns: The link to the parent resource. For example: Channel is linked to its VMD parent.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The link to the parent resource. For example: Channel is linked to its VMD parent.

name: $operationalStatus
desc: Returns: The current operational status of the device. For example: On, Off, Standby, etc.

name: $addoperationalStatus
desc: The current operational status of the device. For example: On, Off, Standby, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The current operational status of the device. For example: On, Off, Standby, etc.

name: $parameterGroup
desc: Returns: The parameter group supported by the current device component that is based on some nomenclature, e.g. cardiovascular.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The parameter group supported by the current device component that is based on some nomenclature, e.g. cardiovascular.

name: $measurementPrinciple
desc: Returns: The physical principle of the measurement. For example: thermal, chemical, acoustical, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The physical principle of the measurement. For example: thermal, chemical, acoustical, etc.

name: $productionSpecification
desc: Returns: The production specification such as component revision, serial number, etc.

name: $addproductionSpecification
desc: The production specification such as component revision, serial number, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The production specification such as component revision, serial number, etc.

name: $languageCode
desc: Returns: The language code for the human-readable text string produced by the device. This language code will follow the IETF language tag. Example: en-US.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The language code for the human-readable text string produced by the device. This language code will follow the IETF language tag. Example: en-US.
